DOC.brief_summary: This study is being conducted to assess the safety and efficacy of amphotericin B deoxycholate in doses of 0.75 mg/kg or 1.0 mg/kg for 15 doses. In each arm the drug is given in the conventional way every alternate day against the daily administration regimen being tested.
DOC.brief_title: Amphotericin B Treatment in Visceral Leishmaniasis
DOC.detailed_description: This study is being conducted to assess the safety and efficacy of amphotericin B deoxycholate in doses of 0.75 mg/kg or 1.0 mg/kg for 15 doses. In each arm the drug is given in the conventional way every alternate day against the daily administration regimen being tested.
DOC.criteria: Parasitologically proved kalaazar HIV positive serology
